caption:
“Carry peace, not perfection.”

Reflection:
Peace is lighter to bear than pride. Walk gently, and grace will keep your pace.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that faith is not about flawlessness but calmness of spirit. God delights more in peace than performance.
